QuestData.Title: Zul's Ethical Dilemma
QuestData.Description: Hm.$b$bDe Gurubashi have earned a reputation for betrayal and weakness. Their activities in Zul'Gurub will be a stain on our records for generations to come.$b$bOn de other hand...$b$bDe Zandalari are above de use of slaves. We are strong, capable. De very existence of mindslaves in dis great city is insulting.$b$bDere is a chant dat will free their minds. Use it near de mindslaves to free dem. $b$bOr you can simply kill dem. It makes no difference to me.
